name: The Unhuman
description:
This game is made for LD39 in 48 hours.

The Unhuman is a game which you're a robot. You have limited power left and it's your decision how to spend it. Will you sacrifice yourself for a human? Which is more valuable you as a robot or another human? This game is about exploring this idea. There are two main endings but endings can change depending on your choices

Controls:

W to move forward
Mouse Left Click to Interact

Ludum dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/the-unhuman Follow me on twitter(Wolderado)
